inn1.comm: Steyn's first ball is punched firmly to mid-on by McCullum
a hint of away movement, a length ball which McCullum outside edges towards backward point, lands just short of the lurking AB de Villiers
in the channel just outside off, McCullum shoulders arms
pegs away at the offstump, McCullum turns ti towards midwicket to get the first runs for New Zealand
well outside off, left alone by Ryder
strays on the pads this time, Ryder gets off the mark by clipping it behind square leg
good ball, hits a length on middle and off, gets some movement and takes the edge as Ryder is squared up, but the ball goes safely past slips and gully
good ball again, pitches on a good length, McCullum pushes it to cover and urges Ryder to stay in his crease as the fielder swoops in
marginally fuller and McCullum pushes sweetly to extra cover
fullish outside off, McCullum eases it to mid off, straight to the fielder
pushed towards backward point for a single
that squirts between Ryder's bat and pad, about a foot outside off, Ryder wafts at it away from his body and is beaten
a cracking shot from Ryder brings up New Zealand's first boundary, a bit of width and he cuts that past point
better from Steyn, much closer to the offstump, and Ryder blocks it back towards the bowler
short of length ball on off, McCullum taps it with soft hands towards cover, the batsmen zip through for a single, good running that
slightly wider, chopped towards cover by Ryder
just outside off this time, Ryder steers it towards point, Duminy (from cover) and AB de Villiers (from backward point) converge on the ball
a misfield from Duminy this time, Ryder punches that towards cover, and Duminy allows a couple of runs to be taken
good delivery from Parnell, pitching on a length, keeps it in the corridor outside off, Ryder is beaten as he looks to defend

spectacular overhead catch from van der Merwe sends back Ryder, the batsman mishit the ball towards midwicket, lobbed in the air, van der Merwe had to back pedal and move to his left before leaping to latch on to the ball, South Africa strike early
full on the offstump, clipped towards the midwicket
keeps it around off, blocked off the back foot towards cover
another dot ball, punched back towards the bowler
ooh, McCullum nearly kisses that one through to the keeper, the length draws McCullum on to the front foot, he tries to defend but is beaten
on middle and off this time, McCullum tries to force it through the covers, bottom hand comes off as he mistimes that shot
Steyn completes the maiden, another ball heading for offstump is defended by McCullum
he's beaten first ball by the angle of the delivery, which goes across him
that should make Guptill feel more confident, a wonderfully-timed push straight past the bowler, the ball races to the boundary
gets forward and defends that off stump delivery towards the off side
pitching outside off and carrying on further away from the batsman with the angle, Guptill isn't interested in playing that one
again too wide outside off to tempt Guptill into a stroke, that one was 140kmh from Parnell
back of a length and on the pads, worked off the thigh pad towards square leg
overpitched on middle and leg, McCullum shows the full face of the bat as he pushes it towards mid-on
shorter this time from Steyn, on middle and off, McCullum  stabs it a touch straighter than the previous one, giving the batsmen time to take a single
Another good-looking boundary from Guptill, half-volley on the pads, clipped behind square leg for four, Steyn is furious with himself
Steyn reverts to his offstump line, Guptill is happy to defend this one to the off side
well outside off this time, Guptil shoulders arms to that one
Steyn sticks to an immaculate line and length, Guptill pushes this one towards mid-off
a top-edged six from McCullum, he was looking to pull that short ball, and it soars very fine down the leg side for a six
fullish on off this time, defended towards extra cover
fullish delivery on the pads, nudged towards square leg, where Hashim Amla chases and dives to stop the ball
again on legstump, turned with soft hands towards midwicket, Amla has more fielding to do
punched firmly towards mid-off, straight at the fielder
again McCullum manages to push the ball directly to a fielder, mid-off this time
Steyn hurls this one on leg stump, eased towards square leg for a single
back of a length ball just outside off, McCullum was advancing down the track with intent, but decides against offering a shot
length ball on offstump, McCullum plays it inside-out towards cover, was in the air for a bit,lands just short of a diving Duminy
'Wait on,' is the call from McCullum as he defends solidly off the front foot towards Duminy
wonderful timing on that shot, there wasn't too much room for McCullum to work with but he lashes that past a diving point fielder
huge appeal for lbw, but that was sliding down the leg side so the umpire turns it down
starts with a length ball on offstump, Guptill gets forward and defends towards cover
Guptill looks to defend an outside off delivery, but plays inside the line
angling into the leg stump, flicked off the thigh pads behind square leg
back of a length outside off, 130kmh, McCullum shows us his forward defensive technique
a touch shorter from Kallis, McCullum tries to steer that one past point, but de Villiers dives and cuts that off
pushed with soft hands towards extra cover for a quick single
shot, man! That's thumped imperiously over extra cover, as McCullum seems width and frees the arms
change of pace, pitched up on off stump, McCullum uses the wrists and turns the ball to midwicket for a quick single, that's smart batting from him
comes forward and defends the ball to the off side
pitched up and this time Guptill leans into a good-looking drive down the ground to mid-off, who runs in quickly but cannot prevent the single
back of a length on the stumps and McCullum defends
superb shot from McCullum, who walks down the track and meets the ball on the full, then pushes it straight back between Guptill's legs, no stopping that
good ball, no room to work with and Guptill has to defend
sharp ball, angles back in from a short length and Guptill defends

ah, nearly! Kallis bangs in a short ball, 141.7ks, it sits up and Guptill goes for the pull, only to inside-edge the ball onto his helmet, then it balloons up and drops safely in front of point and far from slip
pitches it up and gets appreciable lift from the track, Guptill leaves
slower ball outside off, nudged away for a single
gets a bit of room and plays the cut, cramped though, and point fields
that was too wide outside off
full and wide, nice and juicy, Guptill crunches that between the bowler and mid-off for a boundary
this time he's too short, plenty of width for the batsman, lashed past backward point for another boundary
gets his line right finally, just outside off, gets the outside edge from Parnell towards third man
a good bouncer this time, McCullum sways out of the way
pushes his length up this time, McCullum gets forward and pushes it towards cover for a single
Parnell ends Guptill's stay, the batsman went for his favourite pull shot, doesn't get enough on it and the ball loops to a waiting Amla at deep square leg
Kallis welcomes Ross Taylor with a bouncer outside off, Taylor sways out of the way
this time the length is fuller, in the channel outside off, Taylor shoulders arms
on offstump, Taylor gets behind the ball and defends watchfully back to the bowler
that was a hit-me delivery, short and wide, Taylor throws his bat at it, crashes it past cover to get his first runs
short of a length, heading for offstump, Taylor shuffles across and taps it towards the leg side
on middle and off, Taylor across moves across the stumps and clips the ball towards midwicket, placement is good this time
starts with a good delivery, short of length on offstump, McCullum pushes it back to the bowler off the front foot
McCullum was a bit early on that shot, almost popped back to the bowler, lands safely short though
McCullum takes a couple of paces down the pitch as he punches it back to the bowler
Morkel slides this one onto leg stump, nudged towards short midwicket
similar delivery, again played towards short midwicket, this time a few yards to the right of the fielder, so the batsman have time to get a single
length ball on middle, punched again to that midwicket fielder, that's a good start from Morkel, who has had a bit of a struggle with the ball in recent times
McCullum smashes that powerfully towards backward point, AB de Villiers flings himself to his right to cut that off
drops it to the short midwicket and sets off for a tight single, Botha charges in and fields, McCullum really had to put his skates on to make his ground
Kallis keeps pegging away at that offstump, Taylor defends it to the leg side
and again Kallis sends it towards the off stump, defended towards backward point
a bit of width this time, Taylor looks to lash it past cover, mistimes it towards the fielder there
good, steady bowling from Kallis here, nothing fancy but he's managing to keep the runs down, this one was on middle, Taylor gets a bit of an inside edge towards square leg
full, on middle and leg, punched down to long-on by McCullum, who played sensibly so far
some room for Taylor to work with, he only manages to chop the ball towards cover
Albie is also keeping it tight, a nagging line around off, Taylor defends towards cover
this one is fullish and on leg stump, powered to midwicket but doesn't beat the fielder
length ball well outside off, cracked towards backward point, again the placement isn't great
overpitched on middle and off, punched to mid-on, too firmly to have time for a single, Taylor is annoyed with himself
McCullum advances down the track to try throw Kallis off the good length he's been pegging away at, the batsman can only push this one towards mid-on
it's a bit shorter from Kallis this time, McCullum gets behind the line and defends
yet another dot ball, on middle and leg, defended to the leg side by McCullum
a touch overpitched from Kallis, firmly hit back towards the bowler who gets his hand on the ball and parries it to mid-on
strays onto the pads, turned away behind square leg
a touch short, a lot of width for McCullum, who cracks the ball towards cover, doesn't beat the fielder though
driven down to long-off for a comfortable single
Morkel oversteps as he send down a full ball on middle and leg, McCullum inside edges onto the pad and the ball rolls towards the off side, Taylor wanted a single but is sent back, free-hit time
McCullum rocks back and pummels that with a flat bat over long-on, Morkel tried the yorker but it wasn't full enough
short and wide, carved through cover for a single, McCullum didn't time that one as well as he would have liked
very full, nearly a yorker outside off, Taylor gets on the front foot and pushes it towards extra cover
back of a length, nice and tight around off, Taylor gets it away past point
another single through the covers to round off the over, McCullum retains the strike
full and wide outside off, defended towards cover
a bit shorter and closer to off, turned towards short midwicket
similar delivery, McCullum opens the face to play it just in front of point, 'No' he screams as Taylor starts for a single
flighted delivery outside off, McCullum drives it to long on
Taylor walks across the stumps and turns a fullish delivery from outside off behind square leg
skips outside leg to make room and dabs it towards point
starts round the wicket, gets a bit of spin off his first ball, McCullum lunged forward to defend but the turn took it past the outside edge
shorter and far more width this time, McCullum hops back and crunches it to sweeper cover
Taylor again shuffles across, the ball is outside off though, so he blocks it towards point
van der Merwe keeps firing it in flat, Taylor plays it to backward point again
stifled appeal for lbw, Taylor misses the ball and is struck high on the pad, too high to be given out
spin and bounce for van der Merwe, this should interest Vettori, Taylor was clueless against that ball as it turned past his outside edge
tossed up by Botha, full and just outside off, driven firmly back to the bowler
slightly shorter from Botha, McCullum sweeps from outside off towards deep backward square leg
Taylor defends the ball towards the off side
overpitched on middle, Taylor eases it towards long-on for a single
again it is full on off, again the batsman guides it to long-on for a comfortable single
cut away behind backward point, van der Merwe scurries across to do the fielding
slashed towards backward point, Duminy dives to cut that off
full delivery is punched back to the bowler
this time it's on off, driven to the left of the bowler
van der Merwe keeps it full, Taylor plays it back to the bowler
a touch short this time, not too much room to cut, Taylor goes for the shot anyway, gets his placement right and that's a boundary
back to regular programming, fuller from van der Merwe, Taylor pushes it back to the bowler

that's the end of McCullum, fullish delivery from Botha, McCullum goes for the sweep, gets a top-edge which swirls to Duminy at short fine leg, that's a big blow, New Zealand needed McCullum to carry on
that is a length ball way outside the off stump, Elliott tries to sweep but gets a bottom egde
length ball, keeps it tight around off, Eliott gets forward and defends
this was slightly quicker from Botha, Elliottis hurried on as he looks to defend
cries of 'Catch it' as Elliott tries to turn the ball to the leg side, doesn't carry to forward short leg
a bit of width for Taylor, who pushes the ball towards point

sharp turn for van der Merwe, the ball drifts in and then spins away from Taylor, who is beaten as he tries to defend off the front foot, third umpire has been called for to rule about an appeal for a stumping, this is going to be very tight, Taylor had grounded his back foot after he was beaten, then he lifts his leg again, but just after Boucher breaks the stumps, that took many replays to resolve
pitches on middle and straightens, Taylor gets behind the line and defends
a quicker one from van der Merwe, even that one turns a lot, Taylor is beaten
full down the leg side, brushes the pads and races away fine
van der Merwe goes back to pitching on off, Taylor defends
swept well, fine enough to get a couple of runs
a wristy shot from Elliott, the ball races past square leg
this one pitches on middle, Taylor shows the full face of the bat and defends
strays on to leg stump, helped down towards fine leg
shuffles across and turns it behind square leg
gets forward and stabs it towards backward point
slip is nearly in the action first ball, a thick outside edge flies behind point
a quick delivery, still turns enough to beat the batsman
gets on the backfoot and defends it
New Zealand's 100 comes up with a confident drive through extra cover for a couple
punched off the backfoot through the covers
pitching on off stump and turning away, blocked back towards the bowler
Botha appeals for lbw, though the batsman is struck well outside off
Elliott shuffles across to get behind the line and defend
Botha is distraught as Boucher fails to collect a delivery down the leg side, that was very close to leg stump, Elliott had moved way across and didn't get bat on the ball
on the hips, Elliott works it to fine leg
tossed up by Botha, fullish on middle and leg, flicked towards midwicket
inside-edges a drive to short midwicket
Taylor backs away and chops that towards point
opens the face of the bat after reaching out for it, gets the ball towards backward point
shortish ball, punched off the back foot towards the bowler
gets a single this time by pushing the ball between the covers
full, on middle and off, punched to extra cover
skips away from leg stump and scythes that towards sweeper cover
length ball on leg stump, turned towards midwicket
on middle and off, eased towards long-on for an easy single
another comfortable single down to long-on
Taylor was looking to cut that one but it turned in sharply, he couldn't get that one away
driven down to long-on for a single
Taylor uses the cut again, that's one of his favourite strokes, gets a single
short outside off, gets on back foot and drives to sweeper cover
nudged towards square leg
length ball pitching on off and turning away, Taylor plays down the wrong line and is beaten
Taylor gets on the front foot and blocks that one
full ball on middle and leg, gets forward and drives to long-on
helped along with the turn towards short fine leg
tries it again, but the ball gets too quickly to the fielder to allow time for a single
turn and bounce for Botha, Elliott barely manages to defend that
fullish and outside off, jabbed towards the covers for a single
overpitched on offstump, driven down towards long-on
short and wide, the batsman skips back and slashes that past point
starts with a quick boucner, 139kmh, Taylor just about ducks under it
short and wide, Taylor looks to thrash that one, but gets a bottom edge back towards the bowler
slightly overpitched, angling into offstump, turned towards short midwicket
back of a length, on offstump, rises sharply, the batsman gets an outside edge towards third man
another sharp bouncer from Steyn, 142kmh, Elliott is uncomfortable against that, takes his eye off it and is struck on his arms
another bouncer, 143.5kmh, sliding down leg, Steyn is lucky that wasn't deemed a legal delivery
turned from offstump towards AB de Villiers at midwicket
this time the ball is worked to square leg off the back foot
punched down to long-on for another single
full toss outside off, swung away behind point, Morkel dives to try stop the ball at the boundary, his shoe is in contact with boundary rope when he stops the ball
overpitched and wide outside off, Elliott lofts it over extra cover, nicely timed
guided to deep square leg this time
Steyn keeps testing Elliott with bouncer, the batsman gets behind the line and defends this one confidently
opens the face to steer the ball down to third man
length ball on offstump, jabbed towards point
superb delivery, just outside off and climbing sharply, Taylor fishes at it and is lucky not to get an edge on that to the keeper
the batsman's beaten this time as he looks to defend, that was just outside off stump, goes on straight, the batsman plays down the wrong line
back of a length on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
tossed up on the stumps, Elliott drives it to long on
Botha races to his right to cut off the drive from the batsman
punched down to long-off or an easy single
a streaky boundary, an outside egde to third man brings up the 50 partnership
this one is a much more confident boundary, full and wide from Botha, Elliott crashes it through extra cover
Taylor jumps back and slashes that one towards deep backward point
Elliott skips away to make room and dabs that towards cover
on the pads, clipped to midwicket for a single
down the leg side, nudged behind square leg for another single
full and fired into legstump, cries of 'Catch it' as Taylor lofts that towards long-off, lands well short though
a full ball is worked towards midwicket, that ends an over of singles
a bit of width provided, Elliott glides it down to third man
back of a length, angling into offstump, defended off the back foot
length ball on offstump, worked towards midwicket, the batsmen think of a single before deciding against it
Taylor has had enough of hanging around, the slog sweep is finally brought out, connects well and it just about clears the man at deep square
eased to long-on for a single
bangs in the bouncer, nicely dealt with by Elliott, stands tall and opens the face of the bat to glide it towards short third man
turns into the batsman, who was looking to defend, but only got an inside-edge onto the pads
down the leg side, brushes his pad down to short fine
defendly watchfully with the full face of the bat
speared into leg stump, Taylor backs away and chops that through the covers
Elliott gets forward and defends cautiously
van der Merwe ends the stubborn partnership, the ball drifts in nicely and then straightens, Elliott plays down the wrong line and middle stump is knocked back
back of a length and angling into offstump, defended back to the bowler
on middle stump this time, turned towards long-on for a single
bangs in the bouncer, Broom ducks under it easily
another short ball on off stump, played with soft hands towards cover, de Villiers is onto the ball in a flash, a direct hit would have been trouble for Broom
Taylor clips it to backward square leg
another short ball, Broom tries to ride the bounce and guide the ball to third man, mistimes it towards the keeper
full ball on middle and leg, dug out towards cover
again it is overpitched on middle, Taylor makes room and thrashes that through extra cover
this one is a beauty from van der Merwe, it is a touch shorter, and pitches closer to off, the turn defeat Taylor
ooh, miscued by Taylor as he looks to drives, balloons towards point but lands safely

That's the end of Broom, that kept really low, again superb drift for van der Merwe, turns after pitching on middle, Broom was defending off the back foot, but the ball sneaks under his bat, easy decision for the umpire
plays it inside out towards cover, a sharp single is taken
big appeal for lbw from Kallis, looked to have been struck just outside the line, though
again the batsman is rapped on the pad, this time the ball was sliding down leg
goes for the pull, ricochets off his body towards third man
on the pads, Taylor flicks it to deep midwicket
slower ball from Kallis, gets forward and defends watchfully
Kallis keeps nagging away at off stump, Hopkins defends it towards cover
Taylor reaches his fifty by punching a full delivery towards long-off
Hopkins backs away to make room and dabs it towards Duminy at point
fullish delivery, gets an outside edge towards short third man
Taylor walks across the stumps early to get in place for the slog sweep, van der Merwe keeps it full and outside off, defended back to the bowler
this time the slog sweep connects, it's a top edge but still had enough of it to go into the crowd

van der Merwe ends his spell with a wonderful delivery, turns sharply across the batsman who was drawn forward, Boucher whips off the bails, third umpire is called for, Taylor is safe as his back foot was grounded in time
punched to mid-on for a single, could have been tight but the fielder didn't collect the ball
goes for a cross-batted heave, mistimes it back to Steyn
short and wide, Taylor should have capitalised on that one, he crunches it straight towards the point fielder
hacked away towards mid-on for another single
slower ball from Steyn, 113kmh, there was plenty of width allowed, slashed over point for a boundary, one bounce before crossing the rope
another boundary, New Zealand are loving this, a short ball from Steyn, Hopkins looked to pull, gets a top edge over Boucher's head, two bounces before reaching the boundary this time
Taylor is getting into the groove here,  watch out midwicket, a low full toss on leg stump is clobbered along the ground to the midwicket boundary
wonderful shot from Taylor, shuffles across, bends his knee and sweeps Parnell fine for a boundary
yorker on offfstump, good ball from Parnell, driven towards extra cover
Taylor wants to swing it away to the legstump, gets an inside edge and the ball rolls towards square leg
full and outside off, Hopkins swipes it towards midwicket, the fielder wasn't right at the rope, and it sails over him before stopping short of the boundary
a full ball on offstump, Hopkins looks to loft it inside-out, miscued to mid-off, where Duminy takes an easy catch
Steyn starts with a great delivery, a yorker on middle and off, blocked back to the bowler
low, full delivery on off stump, Taylor gets it away towards extra cover for a single, brings Mills on strike
short and just outside off, Mills looks to cut that one but doesn't make contact
another short ball, on middle and off this time, Mills sways out of the way
Steyn makes it a short stay for Mills, back of a length ball just outside off, Mills backed away and sliced it towards point, the mishit results in a simple catch for AB de Villiers
Steyn keeps it full to Taylor, just outside off, squeezed to backward point for a single, Taylor keeps the strike
full toss just outside off, Taylor had walked across his stumps early, he sweeps this one past short fine leg for a boundary
full and outside off, Taylor again thinks of shuffling across, decides against it, then tries to punch it through the off but misses

Parnell's knack of taking late wicket continues, this time it's the big one of Taylor, who misses a low full toss to be struck in front of middle and off, the umpire took his time before lifting his finger, the replay shows the ball would have crashed into leg stump
terrible line from Parnell, fine leg is in the circle, so that leg stump delivery  was an easy put away for Tuffey
Parnell gets one more, a length ball on offstump, sliced by Tuffey to Duminy at short cover, that's his first five-wicket haul in ODIs
back of a length heading for offstump, punched back towards the bowler
full and wide outside off, punched to short cover
back of a length and outside off, Vettori wafts at it and gets an outside edge past the keeper, third man cuts it off
length ball on offstump, defended back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, Bond looks to push it towards point but doesn't connect
that's the end of the inning, short ball does the trick for Steyn, Bond backs away and tries to punch it over point but can only hit it to AB de Villiers, New Zealand are bowled out for 214

inn2.comm: starts with a back of length ball just outside off, Smith glides it to third man, and the crowd cheers South Africa's first runs
slightly shorter this time, and wider, Amla shoulders arms
closer to offstump, and pitched up a bit more, whipped towards mid-on
Mills oversteps, and that will be a free-hit
Amla will be disappointed to get only a single, it was short and outside off, Amla moved across and pulled it but straight at the fine leg fielder
short of length, outside off, Smith taps it to the off side
ooh, that could have been curtains for Smith, goes for the pull, mistimes it horribly, luckily for him it balloons wide of mid-on
starts with a ball on the thigh pad, brushed to short fine leg
short and wide, Amla jumps to get on top of bounce, and crunches it to point, placement isn't great though
short and wider still, Amla chases after it, doesn't connect
length is fuller from Bond, who grunts as he sends that one down, Amla clips it off the back foot towards midwicket
jags in after pitching outside off, 131 kmh, Amla shuffles across and glances it to fine leg
a short of length again from Bond, Amla gets a thick outside edge as he looks to drive, the ball runs down to third man
superb fielding Broom at backward point, Amla cuts a wide ball fiercely, Broom throws himself to his right to cut that one off
on middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket by Amla, the crowd cheering every run of the home team here
length ball just outside off, Amla stands tall and looks to punch it past the bowler, gets it off the inside half of the bat back to the bowler
fullish an on off, Amla clips it towards midwicket
a wonderful back foot punch through the covers, supremely timing on that and the ball races to the boundary

great reply from Mills, a slight inward movement take the ball past Amla's bat, brushes his pad on the way to the keeper, New Zealand are convinced Amla's out caught behind but the replays show there's no bat involved
on middle and leg, short ball, turned to fine leg
short and wide outside off, Amla leaves that one for the keeper
much closer to offstump, similar length, Amla stands tall and pushes it towards the leg side
much better from Bond, a lot fuller, just outside off, Smith reaches across and defends
angling across Smith this time, he shoulders arms to that one
Smith shuffles across and defends the ball to the leg side
length ball just outside off, Amla punches it off the front foot towards cover
back of a length, again in the channel outside off, Amla gives the man at cover some more fielding practice
miscued by Amla, he was on the front foot as he looked to pull, bobs over his hit but lands well short of the keeper
Shane Bond dives at fine leg to save some runs for New Zealand, that ball was on the pads and Amla glanced it fine
gets forward and defends that offstump delivery
again Mills keeps it at a back of a length, probing around off stump,. pushed towards extra cover
starts with an on-target delivery, on a length, tight around off, Smith pokes it towards point
length ball on the pads, Smith takes a couple of steps down the track and clips it to midwicket
fuller and on offstump, Smith lashes it towards mid-on, straight at the fielder
Smith was looking for the similar shot earlier in the over, this time he charged down the track and swatted a middle and leg delivery to the midwicket boundary
not too wide outside off, Smith slashes it hard towards point, doesn't beat the fielder there
Smith is gone, big blow for the hosts, length ball on middle and off, Smith was early into his shot and chips it to mid-on, New Zealand are ecstatic
back of length, on offstump, chopped down to third man for a single
Kallis hops onto the back foot and pushes that off stump delivery just in front of point
Amla tucks this middle and leg ball towards midwicket for another single
Kallis gets four though he mistimes the pull, just about enough on that shot to beat the chasing fielder
rock-solid in defence this time, just outside off, Kallis gets behind the line and blocks it back to the bowler
slightly fuller, same tight line, Kallis leans across and turns the ball towards midwicket
Amla kept on the back foot by the short length, he punches the ball towards cover
takes a couple of paces down the pitch, still can't get the ball away, as he's cramped for room
this time he gets the room to play the cut, but he hits it straight towards the man at point
slower ball, 109kmh, well outside off, Amla is foxed by that one, can't get  bat on it
good shot for no runs, clipped from off stump towards midwicket
good over from Tuffey, he finishes up with a delivery just outside off, to which Amla offers no stroke
he's greeted with a classical cover drive by Kallis for four, that was slightly overpitched, Kallis is quickly into the front foot, and the timing is perfect
Bond shortens his length, Kallis gets behind the line and defends
back of a length and wide outside off, Kallis glides it down to third man for a single
effort ball from Bond, 137kmh, held it's line after pitching, Amla plays inside the line of the ball and gets beaten
full delivery just outside off, driven firmly towards mid-off for a single, that was his quickest delivery of the day, 140.2 kmh
a bit wide outside off, Kallis pokes it towards backward point
Tuffey keeps it steady, no width the batsman, who defendss back towards the bowler
Kallis stands tall and lashes that backward of point for a boundary, he hit that one on the up, great shot from Kallis
Kallis looking in great touch here, a full ball outside off, Kallis shuffles across and flicks it wide of midwicket for another four
another good-looking drive from Kallis, but this time he finds the fielder at cover
Kallis keen to use his feet today, he comes down the pitch, the ball is wide outside off, so he just steers it down to third man
fullish ball outside off, Amla looks to slash it to third man but the ball sneaks under his bat
full and just outside off, driven nicely by Kallis but he can't beat the man at short cover
Bond grunts as he sends down a short ball, Kallis swivels as he pulls that one, but the timing is awry, and the ball dribbles towards midwicket
Amla gets on his toes and uses his wrists to whip it past midwicket
an innovative shot from Kallis, he gets on the front foot, the ball was a little outside off, he just opened the face and glided it past the keeper for four, he was in total control of that
length ball closer to off, Kallis stands tall and punches towards cover
angling into offstump, Kallis leans across and tucks it towards midwicket for a single
Tuffey has been pretty accurate so far, again he ties the batsman down with a tight line
Kallis is in a very aggressive mood here, comes down the pitch and looking to heave it over cover, edges it towards third man
nicely done by Amla, he waits for the ball to come into him, then uses his wrists to flick it towards square leg
a bouncer from Tuffey, Kallis sways under it and tries to punch it over the keeper's head, doesn't connect though
this is overpitched, on offstump, Kallis clips it towards midwicket
good delivery to end the over, length and in the corridor outside off, Amla blocks it towards point
good delivery from Bond, angling into offstump, defended back to the bowler
and again, quicker this time, 142kmh, Kallis gets behind the line and defends
strays on to the pads, Kallis helps it down to short fine leg
shortish ball, tight line around offstump, Amla opens the face to get the ball away towards point
a giant appeal for caught-behind, McCullum was absolutely convinced, Bond less so, a slower ball, legcutter, didn't seem to be any outside edge on that, McCullum says some words kids shouldn't hear
Kallis drops the ball to the leg side, and the batsmen steal a quick single
arm ball from Vettori, Kallis gets a bottom edge back to the bowler as he looked to chop that towards cover
this one is on middle, Kallis moves across and guides the ball to fine leg
a beauty from Vettrori, a sample of the trouble he's going to cause, drifted in and spun sharply out to beat Amla
down the leg side, that's a wide
outside off, poked to point off the back foot
fullish on offstump, Kallis gets forward and pats the ball back to the bowler
Bond starts the over with a bouncer, Amla was thinking of going for the pull but decides to duck under at the last moment
short ball, Amla slices it towards Elliott at third man, was in the air for a while before landing short of the fielder, Bond think Elliott should have run in to try catch that one
Bond's not going to be any happier after this ball, a sharp bouncer, Kallis tries to pull, gets a top-edge over the keeper's head
back of a length outside off, dabbed behind backward point, the batsmen sprint through for two
fuller ball on off, Kallis gets on the front foot and blocks it towards cover
a bit of width for Kallis, he tries to goes for that flamboyant square drive of his, edges it towards point
full ball hits Amla low in front of leg, but that pitched just outside leg
Amla is in all sorts of trouble against Vettori, this time the turn produces an edge which takes the ball past slip and beats the backward point
flighted delivery, Amla tucks it towards midwicket
length ball, Kallis gets forward and drives towards cover
Kallis gets forward and pushes it with soft hands towards point
this one goes straight on after pitching just outside off, Kallis defends towards point
back of a length, heading for middle, Amla punches it towards mid-on
short and wide outside off, Amla initially wanted to duck, but saw the ball wasn't as quick as he thought, so he stuck his bat out to guide it to third man
Bond gets rid of Kallis, short of length ball outside off, Kallis tries to drive well away from his body, feathers it through to the keeper
de Villiers gets off the mark by steering an outside off ball towards third man
Bond slips in the bouncer, 136 kmh, Amla spots it early and ducks under, that is too high for the umpire's liking
Bond gets the outside edge again but it is too thick an edge, the ball flies wide of the keeper for four, New Zealand have no slip
back of a length on offstump, poked towards backward point
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
defends it on the off side
more caution from de Villiers, pushed towards the covers
comes down the track, doesn't quite reach the pitch of the ball, he goes through with a loft over cover
Amla stays on the back foot and turns it towards point
on the pads, clipped towards square leg for a single
Amla shuffles across and turns it towards square leg
length ball outside off, gets the bottom edge and bounces once before reaching the keeper
wide outside the offstump, slower ball, 112kmh, de Villiers reaches across and steers it towards gully
de Villiers again uses his feet to get near the pitch of the ball, tucks it towards midwikcet
down the leg side, McCullum appeals for a caught behind, the umpire signals a wide
Another slower ball, outside off, Amla looks to thrash it through the off side but gets a bottom edge on it
this is even slower, 110kmh, Amla steers it to slip
de Villiers defends watchfully back to the bowler
length ball pitching on middle, turned towards midwicket
length ball turning in towards middle, Amla skips away towards leg and guides the ball towards point
again the point fielder is kept busy as de Villiers guides the ball there
length ball outside off, driven past the bowler
a bit of width, and de Villiers chops it down to backward point
angling into leg stump, Amla works it way towards square leg
on the pads again, de Villiers whips it to deep backward square leg
length ball outside off, de Villiers swipes that towards cover
short and wide, de Villiers again carves it towards cover, a diving Hopkins cuts that off
lovely shot from de Villiers, he waltzes down the track and flicks it past midwicket for a boundary, timing was wonderful on that s=htroke
and an imperious boundary from de Villiers brings up the South African century, he clubs that on off the front foot towards long-on
shows the full face of the bat as he defends back to the bowler
a bit of width for Amla, he cuts hard but can't beat the fielder at point
played delicately behind point for a single
de Villiers taps it back to the bowler off the back foot
not too much room for de Villiers but he slaps that one past point for a couple
pitching on a length on offstump, de Villiers gets forward and drives it to extra cover
full and outside off, guided towards backward point
a yorker on legstump, blocked back to the bowler
takes the ball from outside off and clips it behind square, nicely done by Amla
Ryder keeps it around off, de Villiers drives it firmly back towards the bowler
slightly shorter, de Villiers punches it to mid-off this time
de Villiers ruins what had been a good start by Ryder, he whips a length delivery between mid-on and midwicket for four

Whoa, what happened there? Amla pushed the ball towards short cover and sets off for an absolutely suicidal run, he is wisely sent back by de Villiers, Guptill is onto the ball in a flash and effects a direct-hit, Amla has just made his ground
this time Amla is gone, turns just a little bit after pitching on middle and leg, he's rooted in the crease, height wasn't a  problem either, the umpire sends him on his way
full and wide, Duminy mistimes it back to the bowler
watchfully blocks this one back down the pitch
tossed up, full and well wide of the stump, Duminy lets that go
short and wide this time, Duminy gets off the mark by rocking onto the backfoot and carves it behind point
starts with a delivery on the pads, tucked towards square leg
back of a length, angling across Duminy, who defends off the back foot
length ball on off, again Duminy hops onto the backfoot to push it back towards the bowler
Duminy taps this one towards mid-off, doesn't beat the fielder
this one is short and on the pads, Duminy turns it towards midwicket for a single
a bit wide outside off, de Villiers opens the face to steers it to third man, a misfield there from Bond  allows the batsmen an extra run
starts with a no-ball, that will be a free-hit, guided wide of gully for a single
de Villiers whacks it to long-on, reaches the fielder on the bounce, free-hit doesn't prove too expensive
full toss, lashed towards midwicket, but can't beat the fielder
steered behind point for a single
a full toss screaming 'hit me', de Villiers muscles it straight down the ground, long-on can't get across in time
dances down the pitch and smashes that between long-on and midwicket for another boundary, the Guptill experiment isn't working
ends the over with a single towards extra cover
de Villiers continues to walk down the pitch to the quicker bowlers as well, this time he only defends after advancing down the track
much too short from Mills, sat up to be hit, de Villiers pulls it powerfully in front of square for another boundary
much better from the bowler, length ball angling into middle and leg, de Villiers eases it to long-on
beautiful shot from Duminy, caresses that past extra cover, timing was exquisite on that
great catch from McCullum ends Duminy's innings, it was not exactly a great ball, shortish and wide, Duminy looks to cut that, gets a bottom edge, McCullum who is standing up, hangs on to the chance
short of a length on off stump, Boucher blocks it back to the bowler
Vettori gets that one to turn away from de Villiers, who guides it to backward point
steered towards point this time for a single
Boucher gets a big stride in to defend that one
and again Boucher uses the forward press
length ball pitching on offstump, Boucher eases it towards long-off
slightly short from Vettori, de Villiers pushes it to Vettori's left, the bowler is quickly across to do the fielding
nearly chops that onto the stumps, bottom edge runs away towards short fine leg
back of a length, angling into middle, de Villiers defends with bat and pad close together
de Villiers dabs this one towards gully, and thinks of a single before deciding against it
length ball on middle and off, de Villiers drives it toward long-off for a single
shortish ball, Mills keeping it tight around off, blocked off the back foot
Boucher gets on the front foot and pushes the last ball of the over towards mid-on
de Villiers jumps out of the crease, and defends the ball
just outside off, de Villiers pushes it towards cover
slightly quicker from Vettori, steered to backward point
this time he gets the single, chops it towards point
watchfully defended by Boucher, Vettori has been very accurate today
on middle and leg, turned to short fine leg for a single
short of length, just outside off, Boucher crunches that past point for a boundary
shortish ball on off, Boucher gets an inside edge onto his thigh
fuller on middle and off, Boucher opens the face of the bat and gets the ball towards short third man
again short third man has to do the fielding, this time it is de Villiers who opens the face to steer the ball, South Africa's 150 comes up
short and wide, carved away to deep backward point by Boucher
full, on middle and leg, clipped towards short midwicket
overpitched outside off, slapped through cover by Boucher
another single, this time for de Villiers, he carves the ball past point
South Africa are running away with this, it's a boundary behind point for Boucher this time
a low full toss is clubbed back to the bowler, Ryder lucky that escaped punishment
Boucher goes for an almighty heave, gets a bottom edge  and the ball races away to fine leg
punched firmly to short cover by Boucher
short and wide, guided towards backward point, nicely fielded there
short and very wide, he'll have to rebowl that one
better line from Bond, very close to offstump, de Villiers gets on the front foot and blocks it
short of length and heading for offstump, de Villiers defends that watchfully
de Villiers drops the ball at his feet and immediately sets off for a single, batsmen complete the run easily
that was close, almost a yorker on legstump, Boucher looks to play it inside-out, gets a leading edge which sails past a diving Martin Guptill at short cover
another quick single to end the over, defended to short third man
chopped towards backward point for a single
punched towards point for another single
overpitched on offstump, punched back to the bowler by Boucher
on middle and leg, clipped behind square leg for a single
de Villiers gets to his half-century by standing tall and easing the ball towards long-on
on the pads, Boucher can only tuck it towards the fielder at short midwicket
full, slower ball, 123kmh, de Villiers defends that back towards the bowler
de Villiers cramps himself for room by shuffling across, he has to adjust late to turn the ball towards short fine leg
Bond grunts as he sends down that bouncer, Boucher pulls it powerfully to square leg for a boundary
blocked back down the pitch
slightly overpitched, just outside off, Boucher reaches across and pushes it towards cover
a bit of width for Boucher, he gets on the back foot and slashes it towads backward point, doesn't beat the fielder
de Villiers drops the first ball of the over at his feet, McCullum snatches the ball and whips off the bails, though de Villiers has stayed rooted in the crease
delicate late cut from de Villiers, easy single to third man
length ball angling into the pads, Boucher looks to play it to the leg side but misses the ball and is struck on the pads outside leg
Boucher tries the late cut this time, a bottom edge sends the ball trickling to third man
Boucher is gone, perhaps the breakthrough comes too late for New Zealand, he was looking to guide it to third man again, gets an outside edge, McCullum snaffles another great catch standing up
back of a length, just outside off, decent delivery but Morkel rocks back and carves that through the covers for a boundary
length ball angling into the pads, defended by AB de Villiers
slightly wide, de Villiers is in great touch here, he plays it with soft hands towards third man
Bond angles the ball across the batsman, who is content to leave it through to the keeper
back of a length, on the pads, Morkel blocks it to the leg side
similar length as the previous delivery, it was slightly outside off, Morkel clubs it over point for a boundary, just a couple of bounces before reaching the rope
fuller and wider, Morkel is happy to leave this one
length ball, pitching just outside off, batsman gets forward and blocks
on middle and leg this time, de Villiers get a bit of an inside edge to send the ball to the leg side
tossed up by Vettori, big turn for him, and that beats de Villiers
de Villiers stands tall and crunches it towards cover
defends it to the off side
well outside off, de Villiers leaves that one alone
short of a length, on middle and leg, Morkel pushes it towards cover
slower ball on the pads, 'Two' says Morkel immediately after clipping the ball to square leg
length ball on offstump, poked behind point for a single
overpitched outside off stump, de Villiers lashes that between the covers for a boundary, an attempted slower ball from Tuffey
de Villiers looks to defend, gets an inside edge towards the leg side
length ball just outside off, de Villiers punches it towards extra cover
pushed wide of mid-off for an easy single
fullish on middle and leg, de Villiers gets forward and defends
length ball on middle and leg, de Villiers tucks it towards midwicket
a bit of width for de Villiers, guided behind point for a single, that brings up South Africa's 200
Morkel gets a boundary with the cut, he stayed back and waited for that one, and then crashed it behind point
overpitched, on middle and leg, whipped to midwicket for a single, that ends Vettori's spell
slower ball from Tuffey, 108kmh, on the pads, defended back down the pitch
short and a bit of width for Morkel, who slams it towards deep point
full toss outside off, 'thank you,' says de Villiers as he dispatches it past extra cover, superb timing on that shot
full and just outside off, driven towards cover for a single
short and a wide, Morkel clubs it to deep point, straight at the fielder
outside off, de Villiers dabs it towards short third man
that's it, de Villiers slams it over mid-on for a boundary, superb innings from de Villiers brings South Africa's campaign back on course
